welcome_message_body: Welcome to Auckland, the vibrant City of Sails! Get ready to experience stunning beaches, lush landscapes, and a rich Maori culture. Enjoy your time here and make the most of all the adventures that await you!

restaurants.name: Mrs Higgins Oven Fresh Cookies
restaurants.description: Mrs Higgins Oven Fresh Cookies is a bakery located in Auckland.

restaurants.name: The Original Tony's
restaurants.description: The Original Tony's is a steakhouse located in Auckland.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for all international flights at Auckland International Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal for all domestic flights at Auckland International Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ardmore Airport serves domestic flights to and from various destinations in New Zealand.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Surfdale Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Surfdale Airport handles all freight and logistics operations, ensuring efficient and timely delivery of goods.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
